post.summary: Write raw data to multiple tags within a single interface
post.description:
This endpoint automatically detects and converts value types based on tag configuration.
All tags in the request must belong to the specified interface.
Values can be scalars or arrays, and will be converted to match the tag's configured data type.

parameters.name: interfaceId
parameters.description: Interface ID that all tags must belong to

tagId.description: ID of the tag this aggregated data is for

AggDataValue.description: Response containing an aggregated data value for a single tag

tagId.description: ID of the tag this aggregated data is for

values.description: Array of aggregated values (empty if status is not Success)

AggDataValues.description: Response containing aggregated data values for a single tag

Bound.description: Boundary mode for raw data queries

tagId.description: ID of the tag this current value is for

value.description: The actual value (type varies by tag)

CurrentDataValue.description: Response containing the current value for a single tag

DigitalTextReturn.description: Return format for values from tags with a digital text mapping defined

FileType.description: File organization type for data storage

historyPathId.description: ID of the history path this group is associated with

timezone.description: Time zone for this group (e.g., "Pacific Standard Time")

active.description: Whether this group is currently active

modifiedBy.description: The username of the user who last modified this history path.

modifiedTimestamp.description: The timestamp of when this history path was last modified.

modifiedHost.description: The hostname of the computer on which this history path was last modified.

modifiedIP.description: The address of the computer on which this history path was last modified.

Group.description: Interface group that serves as the top-level container for interfaces and tags

GroupSaveResult.description: Result of a save operation for a single entity

id.description: Unique identifier for this history path

name.description: Display name for this history path

path.description: File system path where data will be stored

modifiedBy.description: The username of the user who last modified this history path.

modifiedTimestamp.description: The timestamp of when this history path was last modified.

modifiedHost.description: The hostname of the computer on which this history path was last modified.

modifiedIP.description: The address of the computer on which this history path was last modified.

HistoryPath.description: Storage location configuration for historical data files

HistoryPathSaveResult.description: Result of a save operation for a single entity

group.description: The group this interface belongs to

groupId.description: ID of the interface group this interface belongs to

overrideHistoryPathId.description: ID of the history path that overrides the group's default (null uses group default)

isPathValid.description: Whether the configured storage path is valid and accessible

active.description: Whether this interface is currently active

modifiedBy.description: The username of the user who last modified this history path.

modifiedTimestamp.description: The timestamp of when this history path was last modified.

modifiedHost.description: The hostname of the computer on which this history path was last modified.

modifiedIP.description: The address of the computer on which this history path was last modified.

Interface.description: Interface that groups tags and defines their storage configuration

InterfaceSaveResult.description: Result of a save operation for a single entity

Interpolate.description: Interpolation method for values at timestamps between raw values

historyPathId.description: ID of the history path this group will be associated with

timeZone.description: Time zone for this group (e.g., "Pacific Standard Time")

NewGroup.description: Request to create a new interface group

name.description: Display name for the history path

path.description: File system path where data will be stored

NewHistoryPath.description: Request to create a new history path for data storage

groupId.description: ID of the interface group this interface will belong to

overrideHistoryPathId.description: ID of the history path that overrides the group's default (null uses group default)

NewInterface.description: Request to create a new interface

interfaceId.description: ID of the interface this tag will belong to

deadbandMin.description: Minimum valid value (lower values marked bad or clipped)

deadbandMax.description: Maximum valid value (higher values marked bad or clipped)

clipToDeadbandMin.description: Clip values below minimum to DeadbandMin

clipToDeadbandMax.description: Clip values above maximum to DeadbandMax

deviation.description: Change threshold before storing (percent or absolute)

deviationIsAbsolute.description: Whether deviation is absolute (true) or percent (false)

historize.description: Whether to store historical values (default true)

calcAggregates.description: Whether to calculate aggregate values (default true)

taglistVisible.description: Whether visible in tag browsers (default true)

digitalMapId.description: ID of the digital map this tag is configured with

allowWrites.description: Whether collectors can write values back

NewTag.description: Request to create a new tag

tagId.description: ID of the tag this raw data is for

values.description: Array of raw values (empty if status is not Success)

RawDataValues.description: Response containing raw data values for a single tag

value.description: The actual value (type varies by tag)

tagId.description: ID of the tag to write to

history.description: True to write as historical data, false for current values

RawWriteData.description: Data to write for a single tag

data.description: Array of write operations for multiple tags

awaitCompletion.description:
Wait for write to fully complete. If false, write will be validated and queued, returning before being written
to history. If true, the write will return only once the data has been written to history.

RawWriteRequest.description: Request to write raw timeseries data

failed.description: Number of values that failed to write

errors.description: Array of error messages if any

RawWriteResponse.description: Response from a raw data write operation

value.description: The value to write (type will be inferred based on the tag's configured data type)

RawWriteValue.description: A single timeseries value to write

SaveStatus.description: Overall status of a batch save operation

group.description: The group this tag belongs to

interface.description: The interface this group belongs to

interfaceId.description: ID of the interface this tag belongs to

deadbandMin.description: Minimum valid value (lower values marked bad or clipped)

deadbandMax.description: Maximum valid value (higher values marked bad or clipped)

clipToDeadbandMin.description: Clip values below minimum to DeadbandMin

clipToDeadbandMax.description: Clip values above maximum to DeadbandMax

deviation.description: Change threshold before storing (percent or absolute)

deviationIsAbsolute.description: Whether deviation is absolute (true) or percent (false)

digitalMapId.description: ID of the digital map this tag is configured with

active.description: Whether this tag is currently active

allowWrites.description: Whether collectors can write values back

modifiedBy.description: The username of the user who last modified this history path.

modifiedTimestamp.description: The timestamp of when this history path was last modified.

modifiedHost.description: The hostname of the computer on which this history path was last modified.

modifiedIP.description: The address of the computer on which this history path was last modified.

Tag.description: Tag representing a data stream (sensor, calculation, etc.)

TagSaveResponse.description: Response from a batch save operation

TagSaveResult.description: Result of a save operation for a single entity
